Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI

Class TakeResourcesController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.Controller
it.polimi.ingsw.client.view.GUI.TakeResourcesController
public class TakeResourcesController
extends Controller
Class that represents the controller of the Take Resources from Market page of the game On this page the user can perform the action of Take Resources From Market obtaining up to a maximum of 4 resources by choosing to take 3 or 4 marbles based on the choice of column or row

      private boolean haveToChooseConvertMarbleEffect()

      public void initializeConvertMarbleButtons​(javafx.scene.layout.HBox target)

      Parameters:
      target - Hbox containing the buttons of convert marble

      public void setPositionButton()

      method used to set the imageView of the marbles actually present in the MarketTray

    • showOkButton

      private void showOkButton()
      method used to make the positioning confirmation button visible for the resources obtained only after selecting all the destinations for each resource
